# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input)
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 <= text_width
            if line == ""
                line *= word
            else
                line *= " $word"
            end
        else
            println(line)
            line = word
        end
    end
    println(line)
end
```

Example:
```julia
wrap_string("This is a test to wrap a string at a certain width", 15)
```
